articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Pebble reboots its thinnest smartwatch with the Pebble Round 2 - TechCrunch
articles.description: Pebble launches a $199 smartwatch with rounded screen that can last up to 2 weeks on one charge.
articles.content: Shortly after bringing back the Pebble smartwatch and launching a low-cost AI smart ring, Pebble is readying yet another new product: the Pebble Round 2. As the name suggests, this latest device is a… [+4030 chars]
